Metrion Biosciences 扩大了高级领导团队，任命 Robert Kirby 博士为首席运营官，任命 Edward Stevens 博士为首席战略官Metrion Biosciences Limited（“Metrion”）是一家专业离子通道合同研究和药物发现公司。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Metrion-Biosciences-expands-senior-leadership-team-with-appointments-of-Dr-Robert-Kirby-as-COO-and-Dr-Edward-史蒂文斯作为 CSO.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Metrion-Biosciences-expands-senior-leadership-team-with-appointments-of-Dr-Robert-Kirby-as-COO-and-Dr-Edward-史蒂文斯-as-CSO.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cba89430-613c-4246-83ec-383695c8e70d Thu, 06 Jul 2023 06:02:00 -0400 Metrion Biosciences expands senior leadership team with appointments of Dr Robert Kirby as COO and Dr Edward Stevens as CSO

肺功能障碍和 COVID-19 严重程度在长 COVID 发展中的作用研究确定了长冠状病毒疾病的全基因组显着关联（GWAS）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/The-role-of-pulmonary-dysfunction-and-COVID-19-severity-in-the-development-of-Long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/The-role-of-pulmonary-dysfunction-and-COVID-19-severity-in-the-development-of-Long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a41c4fb6-5004-43c0-bf57-9753bd9a22dd Thu, 06 Jul 2023 04:56:00 -0400 The role of pulmonary dysfunction and COVID-19 severity in the development of Long COVID

季节和日照时间可能会影响体外受精后的活产率根据今天（周四）在世界领先的生殖医学期刊之一《人类生殖》上发表的新研究，在生育治疗期间从女性卵巢收集卵子的时间会对活产率产生影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Season-and-sunshine-hours-may-affect-live-birth-rates-after-IVF.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Season-and-sunshine-hours-may-affect-live-birth-rates-after-IVF.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb44e70d-cee1-4550-82a1-f340b8bbff6f Wed, 05 Jul 2023 23:12:01 -0400 Season and sunshine hours may affect live birth rates after IVF
eHealth 应用程序可帮助患者从重大腹部手术中恢复速度加快 30%通过使用电子健康应用程序 ikHerstel，重大腹部手术后的患者恢复速度比不使用该应用程序的患者快 30%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/eHealth-app-helps-病人-recover-from-major-abdominal-operations-3025-faster.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/eHealth-app-helps-病人-recover-from-major-abdominal-operations-3025-faster.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e27ae31b-a112-44ba-bfd2-b7b82f4e070c Wed, 05 Jul 2023 23:06:02 -0400 eHealth app helps patients recover from major abdominal operations 30% faster
睡眠不足会削弱体力活动的认知益处伦敦大学学院研究人员的一项新研究表明，随着年龄的增长，定期的体育活动可以防止认知能力下降，但对于睡眠不足的人来说，这种保护作用可能会减弱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Short-sleep-can-diminish-the-cognitive-benefits-of-physical-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Short-sleep-can-diminish-the-cognitive-benefits-of-physical-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe2f427e-ebd0-416a-be80-c8a3bce760e2 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 23:02:21 -0400 Short sleep can diminish the cognitive benefits of physical activity
缓解脆性 X 综合征的新疗法可能即将出现由麻省大学陈医学院的 Joel D. Richter 博士、Sneha Shah 博士和 Jonathan K. Watts 博士以及 RUSH 大学医学中心的 Elizabeth Berry-Kravis 博士开发的反义疗法可恢复脆性 X 综合征患者细胞样本中的 FMRP 蛋白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/New-therapy-to-mitigate-fragile-X-syndrome-may-be-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/New-therapy-to-mitigate-fragile-X-syndrome-may-be-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e2793dd-968c-4780-b0d6-1a5d526ad917 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 22:58:04 -0400 New therapy to mitigate fragile X syndrome may be on the horizon
COVID-19 对洛杉矶低收入社区的打击更为严重；疫苗接种被证明是减少差距的关键在洛杉矶推出疫苗之前，低收入社区的 COVID-19 发病率高于高收入社区。然而，接种疫苗后，COVID-19 发病率的差异缩小，最低收入社区受到疫苗接种的影响最大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/COVID-19-strikes-harder-on-low-venue-communities-in-LA3b-Vaccination-proves-key-to-reducing-disparity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/COVID-19-strikes-harder-on-low-venue-communities-in-LA3b-Vaccination-proves-key-to-reducing-disparity.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff514f85-584a-4096-b9fa-4b242d1870b7 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 22:45:00 -0400 COVID-19 strikes harder on low-income communities in LA; Vaccination proves key to reducing disparity
